summary: For some reason, and because it is something that needs to be done from time to time when you selfhost, today turned out to be update day.  It all started because I decided today was the day for updating my 2 proxmox hosts to debian bookworm and proxmox v8â€¦ But it went so smoothly (I expected stuff to broke, so that was an awesome surprise. ) that I also took a bit of time to update many other things...
title: Selfhosting update day!
